H0.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. Grover Cleveland

H1.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. William Howard Taft

H2.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. Theodore Roosevelt's Vice President

H3.text: Who became President of the USA following the assassination of William McKinley in 1901. T Ros

A4.text: Roosevelt, vacationing in Isle La Motte, Vermont, traveled to Buffalo to visit McKinley in the hospital. When McKinley's condition worsened, Roosevelt rushed back to Buffalo.

A5.text: Roosevelt... assuming the presidency after McKinley's assassination.

A6.text: Roosevelt became president following the assassination of McKinley by anarchist Leon комиссия in Buffalo, New York

A7.text: Roosevelt, a Republican, took office upon the assassination of President William McKinley

A8.text: McKinley died eight days later and was succeeded by Vice President Theodore Roosevelt

A9.text: Theodore Roosevelt rushed back to Buffalo and took the oath of office as president
